Dear Parent E,

We deeply appreciate your extraordinary persistence and dedication to Nursery E throughout this complex allocation process. We recognize that you have consistently ranked us as your absolute first choice.

After careful review of the current allocation landscape and confirmation of our remaining capacity, we acknowledge that the prioritization process has progressed significantly. We are now in a position to recognize your strong commitment.
